channel.title: Chris cobb , aka saevion
channel.description:
I remember their was a topic in the news about one of our members , saevion I believe . He died . Mopar made a topic about , No! It was evan , Or a name like that . I just wanted to read it again . I wonder if anybody knows the url or something. I cried -,- . it was one of my first times on Moparisthbest.com , away from moparscape I came here in search of runescape cheats. I found some interesting discussions here. But they are here no longer for me. I just remember that topic and about his father's emails about he had about 5 but he checked them all. I remember it , it was fun to read the simulating conversations.
I just searched saevion on the members list and found this.
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=85142
Is it the truth?
Now threw the post's of that particular member and saw the post's she had were in the topic I was looking for. I will read through it and and cry all over again!

item.title: Chris cobb , aka saevion
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

no, your spot on

there fucking gay

they never even knew him

item.title: Chris cobb , aka saevion
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:4, topic:193837”][quote author=nohope link=topic=258012.msg2143109#msg2143109 date=1206767786]
Yes , not to be cocky but please read the last line of text. Thank you I read threw it again and saw his picture and cried! Sean… I remember now…
[/quote]

I’m not trying to disrespect saev, but why do you cry over the death of someone you have never spoken to, met, or even heard of.[/quote]
He is a sensative one like me

Read full topic

item.title: Chris cobb , aka saevion
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Yes, Chris died. Yes, that profile really is/was his sister. The topic was posted by Sean, so you can search using that name to find the post (Sean dosen’t make that many posts :P)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 28, 2008, 09:54:05 PM[/size][hr]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,80388.0.html

There. I’m not sure how you failed to find it, considering his sister posted in it

Read full topic
